title: Beauty in the sorrow
author: VD
content_html: I don’t care about baseball. I actively dislike ESPN – though not enough to give up The Sports Guy. But there’s something a little bit poignant in the emotions being expressed by these Red Sox fans. Sports is not important, but perhaps because they are not important we are able to express ourselves freely about how they make us feel.
